mapper.select:
select a.q_no as "qqNo", a.members_no as "membersNo", a.q_title as "qqTitle", a.q_contents as "qqContents", a.q_code as "qqCode", a.q_date as "qqDate", a.q_views as "qqViews", a.q_tags as "qqTags", m.members_id as "membersId", m.members_pw as "membersPw"
from members m join question a on a.members_no = m.members_no
